name: Trivia Vault: Mixed Trivia
description: Answer mixed category trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value. Correct answers lock in the digit code for the vault, 10 correct answers cracks the vault and awards bonus cash. Track your progress and aim for higher scores to accomplish higher ranks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2,0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
